name: Sequence
summary: As Iridium's first title, Sequence combines elements from both roleplaying and rhythm genres. As a result, traditionally slow RPG combat is fast and frenetic, while players can enjoy the additional benefits of character customization, inventory management, and a deep and engrossing plot.
info:
